frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering Raleigh 2023
frontmatter.price: In-Person and Virtual Attendance are Free
frontmatter.registration_text: Register to Attend In-person or Virtually
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering is in June (Tentative Date is June 28) in Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live in Raleigh, NC and broadcast live. As always, our focus is on creating a space for peer-to-peer interactions and we'll be going hybrid, so if you are unable to attend in person, join us online. This Gathering will focus on Case Studies from and by End Users with production deployments of OpenShift sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way. Topics covered during this Gathering include hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and new Emerging technology initiatives on the Edge.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Reception is Open to all registered attendees and starts at 5:00 p.m.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Unlock the Potential of Collaboration
OpenShift Release and Road Map Update
AMA with Red Hat Engineers, Product Managers and Leads
